title: David Saves Keilah and Escapes Saul
summary: David saves the city of Keilah from the Philistines, but God reveals the people would betray him to Saul. David escapes and continues to hide in the wilderness, where Jonathan visits and encourages him.

faq.question: Why did David leave Keilah after rescuing it?
faq.answer: Because God revealed that the people would turn him over to Saul.

faq.question: What did Jonathan do during this time?
faq.answer: He visited David, encouraged him, and reaffirmed their covenant.
